{{Infobox Website |name = Badongo |logo = [[Image:Badongo.com logo.png|150px]] |screenshot = [[Image:Badongo.com screenshot.png|250px]] |caption = |url = [http://www.badongo.com/ www.badongo.com] |alexa = {{decrease}} 9,305 ({{as of|2011|12|2|alt=December 2011}})<ref name="alexa">{{cite web|url= http://www.alexa.com/siteinfo/badongo.com |title= Badongo.com Site Info | publisher= [[Alexa Internet]] |accessdate= 2011-12-02 }}</ref><!--Updated monthly by OKBot.--> |commercial = yes |type = [[File hosting service|File hosting]]/[[One-click hosting]] |language = Multilingual (10) |registration = optional |owner = ICL Ltd. |author = Patrick Boden |launch date = 2005 |current status = online |revenue = |slogan = }} [[Image:Badongo uploading.png|thumb|right|uploading a file to badongo.com]] '''Badongo''' is a [[one-click hosting]] (and [[file hosting service|file hosting]]) service, based in the [[USA]]. It seems not to be available in some countries ([[Madagascar]] for example). In Portugal Badongo means pig.
== Details of the service == === Services for unregistered users=== *Download speed limited to 500 kbit/s *Download data volume limited to 4.8 GB per day *Only one download at a time *Captcha and 45 s waiting time *Files are deleted after 50 days if they are not downloaded (except images) <!-- *Images are never deleted (unless the uploader does delete them) --> *Music is never deleted (unless the uploader does delete them) *Streaming Videos are never deleted(unless the uploader does delete them) *Playing of some videos directly from the website (only some formats), without the need to download the file
=== Services for registered users (free membership)=== Once they register, they receive every feature available for non members, and the following: *Download data volume limited to 12 GB per day *Captcha and 15 s waiting time *Files are deleted after 90 days if they are not downloaded *Ability to Create Music Playlists *Ability to Create Photo Albums and Slideshows *Ability to upload multiple files at once *Ability to use FTP for uploads *Ability to transcode videos into Flash format *Access to the Timeline *Ability to post to Social Networks such as Facebook, MySpace ,Orkut and others. *Ability to upload files with the Badongo Buddy *User webspace (URL will be like this: username.badongo.com)
=== Services for "Premium" users=== In premium membership, they receive every feature available for free members, and the following: *Unlimited download speed *Unlimited download data volume *No captcha and no waiting time *Unlimited number of parallel downloads *Downloading with the Badongo Buddy *UseNet Search and download access *Delay- and advertisement-free downloads

== Badongo My Files for iPhone ==
